Examples include reviewing and getting advice on your last will, reviewing other legal documents, and more. • Tax professional advice and consultations. Speak with an experienced tax professional on an unlimited number of new tax issues • Annual legal checkup with an attorney: Just like getting an annual checkup of your health with your doctor, it’s important to get an annual checkup of important legal documents with an attorney. You might not realize (or get busy and forget) that changes in your life such as moving, having a child, having more grandchildren, etc., can impact your last will or other legal documents. • Unlimited access to LegalZoom legal forms: Whenever you need legal support, you can access and download hundreds of legal forms for personal use. Examples include affidavits, bills of sale, nondisclosure agreements, promissory notes and more. • 25% savings on additional attorney services: You get substantial savings on professional attorney services should you need go to court. • 20% savings on any additional tax services • 10% savings on any LegalZoom legal documents: Take advantage of valuable savings on any LegalZoom legal documents, including Living Trusts, LLCs, Trademarks and more.
